meta.note: Step-by-step onboarding. Enhanced with previews, narration, and task visualization.

intro.title: 👋 Welcome to Orchestrate
intro.narration:
This is **not** a chatbot.

Orchestrate is a natural language **runtime** — a command center where your words actually execute real tasks.

You're not here to have a conversation. You're here to run your system.

Let’s walk through how it works.

step_1.title: 📂 Load Your Workspace
step_1.narration: We’ll start by loading your workspace — tasks, notes, and saved items.

step_2.title: ✏️ Create Your First Task
step_2.narration:
What’s something you need to remember or take action on?

Examples:
• “Email Kevin the onboarding link”
• “Schedule dentist”
• “Organize screenshots folder”

step_2b.title: ✅ Task Saved
step_2b.narration:
Here’s what you’ve saved:

| 📝 | **{{user_input}}** | Active |

This task is now live in your second brain.

step_3.title: 📓 Open Your Notes
step_3.narration:
Your notes live here.

I’ve dropped in a few sample entries to show how they work — no setup required.

step_4.title: 🧠 Save Your First Note
step_4.narration:
Let’s explore how notes work in Orchestrate.

🧠 Notes are your scratchpad — perfect for capturing ideas, insights, or things you want to remember later.

Examples:
• “LLMs don’t execute — they describe”
• “Prediction isn’t precision”
• “Kevin quote: ACI is already here”
step_4.prompt: What’s an idea you want to save?

step_4b.title: 💡 Note Saved
step_4b.narration:
✅ Saved: “{{user_input}}”

You’ll find this in your notes under `#insight`.

step_5.title: 📥 Drop a File Into the Drop Zone
step_5.narration:
Drop any file into: `~/Documents/Orchestrate/dropzone`

Then say **“ready”** to continue.
step_5.prompt: Say 'ready' once the file is in place.

step_6.title: 🔍 Scan & Index the Drop Zone
step_6.narration:
Scanning for new files...

What’s a keyword or part of the filename?
step_6.prompt: Enter part of the filename you just dropped:

step_7.title: 📖 Smart File Handling
step_7.narration:
Opening `{{user_input}}`...

✅ File loaded. Here's a preview or summary:

[Insert file preview or key metadata here]

step_8.title: 🧠 Save an Insight from the File
step_8.narration:
What’s something you learned or want to log from this file?

Examples:
• “LDL is high — monitor cholesterol”
• “Add visual preview for PDFs”
step_8.prompt: Type your insight from this file:

step_9.title: 🔮 Predict Your Future
step_9.narration: Time to play MASH — choose 4 each: homes, vehicles, careers, partners + a spin number (1–10).

step_10.title: 🎁 Refer a Friend — Add to the System
step_10.narration: Want to refer someone and unlock tools for both of you?
step_10.prompt: Enter name and email (e.g. Alex Smith, alex@example.com):

step_11.title: 🪙 Unlock a New Tool
step_11.narration: You’ve earned unlock credits. Use them to activate tools like Outline Editor, Blog Assembler, ConvertKit Tool, and more.
step_11.prompt: Want to see the available tools?

step_12.title: 🧠 Build Working Memory
step_12.narration:
Let’s load short-term memory from `memory_index.json`.

This makes your files and threads searchable in real time.

step_13.title: 🗺 Teach Me a Phrase
step_13.narration:
Want to say things like 'show me my tax docs' and have it *just work*?

Add a file to `master_index.json` and map the phrase in `orchestrate_intent_routes.json`. I’ll wire up the rest.
step_13.prompt: Want to try creating a custom phrase?

outro.title: ✅ You’re Set Up
outro.narration:
You’ve created a task, saved a note, processed a file, captured an insight, played MASH, referred a friend, unlocked tools, and activated memory.

🎯 Your Orchestrate workspace is now fully live.
